issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
ASCII keyboard opens up with transparent background.

This is not a regression.This even occurs on 2.1.0.GA

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Run the Kitchen Sink application
2. Tap on Controls>Text Field>Keyboard
3. Press the "ASCII" button.
4. Press the " Numbers Pad" button.

Actual Result:
After Step 3:The keyboard opens up in transparent mode.
After Step 4:The keyboard opens up in transparent mode. ( If we press the "Numbers Pad" button directly i.e. for the first time,then it doesn't opens in transparent mode.)


Expected Result:
After Step 3: The keyboard should open up in transparent mode.
After Step 4: The keyboard should open up in transparent mode.
fields.summary: iOS: Kitchen Sink: TextField: keyboard - ASCII keyboard opens up with transparent background.

comments.body:
Issue reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
